name: School Farm Bed and Breakfast

reviews.text: We stayed here while at a family wedding, with our two young children as well. Debbie couldn't be more helpful, provided a cot, high chair, babysitting at night, and is brilliant with children. The breakfast is world class. The rooms are clean and nicely decorated. Thank you!!!
reviews.title: Fabulous B&B, excellent service

reviews.text: This is the second time we stayed at School Farm,as we were so impressed the first time round.Debbie and Nigel are a lovely couple,and nothing is to much trouble for them. The bedding is so fresh and clean,loads of hot water in the shower,and the breakfast goes on and on.I would recommend everyone to stay here,your only problem would be you would not want to leave....EVER. Dawn&Kim.
reviews.title: 1st class accommodation.1st class hosts.

reviews.text: We stayed for one night, but wish it had been longer. Such a lovely welcome from Debbie, could not have done more to make our stay more comfortable. Beautiful room, with all the little extra touches that made it special. Debbie made a booking at the local pub for our evening meal, the food was great and the locals so friendly.Breakfast was really nice, couldn't ask for more.Would definately stay here again. Lovely, lovely hosts.
reviews.title: Lovely room, lovely hosts.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Excellent accommodation. Debbie was thoughtful and welcoming, making us feel very at home. Lemon cake and iced water on our arrival. Most appreciated on such a hot day. Nothing was too much trouble. She booked our evening meal at the local pub. The attention to detail and the little extras made a difference and were very much appreciated. Great selection for breakfast, catering for a wide variety of tastes. Very comfortable bed. Spotless room and en-suite. We will certainly stay here again next time we are in the area.
reviews.title: Highly recommended

reviews.text: I Stayed at School Farm with two colleagues attending a conference at nearby Yeo Valley. Debbie's warm welcome was followed by fresh milk and chilled water brought to our rooms, to go with the jar of home baked biscuits already there.
reviews.title: 5 Star B&B, Want for nothing

aka: School Farm Bed And Breakfast Blagdon, England
